Reviews.Title: “Disgusting hotel”
Reviews.Author: Vladimir_spb_11
Reviews.Content: This is a most terrible hotel I've ever been. The room was not so bad. It has just a strange smell. But the bathroom is frightful. There are a lot of funguses in the bathroom. A curtain in the shower was the only water stopping device. When you take shower all the water run right on the floor. There was no bath extractor fan. So all the steam remain in the bathroom. The breakfast is very poor. There are only hard-boiled eggs, baked goods, jams and cheeses. The hotel doesn't accept credit cards. They accept only cash!!! Internet works only in a lobby. The only good thing about this hotel is location. It is very close to main attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Albion Boutique in Sultanahmet is very OK!”
Reviews.Author: feelena
Reviews.Content: Im a regular traveler and at times travel stand by thats why I couldn't reserved for a room right away.Last Nov 5 -9 '11 I was in istanbul.Night before my daughter checked on Hotel Albion and had this hotel of our choice on standby and when I arrived I proceeded there.My 3 1/2 days stay were fine, the people in the reception area ,Oktoy and Candan were so friendly and helpful to give some touristic pointers and places to go.Its just the regular basic but clean and the location of this hotel is great,right at Sultanahmet and walking distances from all the Istanbul world heritages incredible sites.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel support!”
Reviews.Author: AndrewOkunev
Reviews.Content: I wrote a letter to the hotel to provide information about services. Within 10 minutes I received a detailed response. The first time I meet such a high level of such consultation. Albion Hotel Boutique - certainly the first in the list for a future rest! Thanks

Reviews.Title: “Unclean and outdated”
Reviews.Author: normerc
Reviews.Content: The (very small!) hotel bathroom smelt very dank and unclean. My husband got a splinter in his foot from wood shavings on the floor - which was covered by a dirty and stained carpet. It looks like the owners are basically not bothered with improving the building in any way. Certainly not worth the money - we only stayed one night!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Ok Room, Eat out for breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Ickerax
Reviews.Content: giving this 4 out of 5 based purely on the location, its within 10 mins walk of 5 major atractions Aya sofia, the palace, the cistern, the bazaar and a the archiology museum. The room was basic but had satelite tv and a empty fridge for storing drinks. the bed was good and great for a nights sleep but the bathroom was tiny. Only 2 gripes really, WiFi didnt seem to reach the top floor where i was staying so had to bring laptop down to the lounge area which did have lots of tables and cushions to sit on so that was ok. The other thing is the breakfast, I had it one day and went out other days,there is a very basic range of stuff and a sheet of paper where you can buy cooked items for extra. In summary, you probably wont find a better hotel in such a good location for the price but be prepared to eat out at breakfast time.

Reviews.Title: “Value Of Money.”
Reviews.Author: bartulon
Reviews.Content: This is our third time in Istanbul and this time we wanted to choose a basic hotel. Albion Hotel is such a great place for travellers demand a clean and basic room enough for a good sleep and generous breakfast. We also appreciate all the hotel staff, they were all very helpul and attentive.

Reviews.Title: “Please avoid!”
Reviews.Author: Kamilla2
Reviews.Content: It was night when I was coming from airport and I asked driver to take me to hotel not so expensive. then he bought me to this awful hotel. Which cost 80$ per night I stayed there only one night, but that night for me was one of the terrible night form whole my life. Especially untidy bathroom with bad smell which spread to room. I couldn't sleep I only waiting when morning will be come.

Reviews.Title: “Would go back.”
Reviews.Author: BubbleBandit
Reviews.Content: Nice, affordable 3* hotel. Don't expect to much - it's quite basic, but very central if you're just looking for a place to sleep. Staff are friendly and and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: jane2625
Reviews.Content: visited istanbul in march and stayed at albion hotel,this hotel is in an excellent location near to all tourist attractions,rooms were very clean and nicely furnished,staff were fantastic and very helpful they made us very welcome,i travelled with young children and the staff always had time for us,the hotel manager was very welcoming ,this hotel has everything you need for a perfect stay in istanbul i would definately recommend this hotel .

Reviews.Title: “nice and very close old history”
Reviews.Author: turcohonkong
Reviews.Content: This is my second time to saty in Albion hotel in istanbul; New owner get it restoreted and well furnitured. it is so nice hotel located to all historical places. staffs are so nÄ±ce and helpfull. This is totally recomended hotel.. go and get its amenities..
